thread.title: Average Location, Friendly Staff, Great Eateries & Supermarkets Around
thread.title_full: Average Location, Friendly Staff, Great Eateries & Supermarkets Around - Review of Home MODERNE, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sameer_Khullar
title: Average Location, Friendly Staff, Great Eateries & Supermarkets Around
text: This was the last stay in our three week, nine country visit to Europe. We liked the hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Rooms were small, but then average for Paris. Several great eateries around. We especially liked Tatou Pizza and Aux 100 Kilos. Multiple supermarket options, one right across the road and a Carrefour at a five minute walk... Recommended.
